cs.cmdletexec.error: &33mCmdlet '{name}' didn't execute fully, might be an error in the cmdet code! &0m
cs.cmdletexec.longpath.disabled: &31mCommand execution-string was to long! (Win32 LongPath support is disabled)&0m
cs.cmdletexec.reader.nomainfunc: &31mReader {reader} has no main function, can't call with command!&0m
cs.cmdletexec.reader.errorincall:
&31mThere was an error calling the reader main function for {reader}!
{traceback}&0m
cs.cmdletexec.emptyreaderfield: &31mNo reader was found for the cmdlet '{command}'!&0m
cs.prefixsys.dynprefix.errorincall:
&31mThere was an error calling the dynPrefixFile generate function in '{dynPrefixFile}'!
{traceback}&0m
cs.prefixsys.dynprefix.invalidinclude:
&31mThere was an error calling the dynPrefixFile generate function in '{dynPrefixFile}'!
&0m&41mInvalid include() call!&0m
cs.welcome.channelmsg.dev: &31mYou are running a development version of crosshell, these are far from final so bugs may occure and some features migth be missing.&0m
cs.welcome.channelmsg.alpha: &33mYou are running a alpha version of crosshell, bugs may occure and some features migth be missing.&0m
cs.welcome.channelmsg.beta: &33mYou are running a beta version of crosshell, although these are more stable then alpha versions bugs may still occure.&0m
cs.welcome.channelmsg.viva: &31mYou are running the current version of Crosshell-VIVA, these are generally stable but may contain bugs.&0m
cs.welcome.channelmsg.unrecognised: &31mThe version channel of your crosshell installation is not reconized, this may be a bug. (Channel: '{channel}')&0m
cs.welcome.channelmsg.unknown_setbydef_t: &31mThe version channel of your crosshell installation could not be retrived, due to crosshell being in fileless mode. (Channel: '{channel}', Tags: '{tags}')&0m
cs.welcome.msg.main: &32mWelcome, write 'help' for help. To add messages to here edit: /assets/profile.msg&0m
cs.welcome.msg.guide: &32mWelcome, for a guide on how to use crosshell write 'guide' or for command help write 'help'.&0m
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_1: Every day may not be good, but there's something good in every day.
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_4: You are capable of amazing things.
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_5: The best is yet to come.
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_7: Today is a good day for a good day.
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_8: Dream big and dare to fail.
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_9: There is always a reason to be thankful.
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_11: The sun will rise again tomorrow. (Unless you are a gamer and it's already up)
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_12: Be the reason someone smiles today.
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_14: Kind people are my kind of people.
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_15: You are unique and that's your superpower.
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_16: You are the author of your own story.
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_17: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_18: A smile is a universal welcome.
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_19: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_21: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_22: Life is short, make it sweet.
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_23: Cherish the moments that make you smile.
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_24: Keep your face always toward the sunshineâ€”and shadows will fall behind you.
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_25: You are the rainbow in someone else's cloud.
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_26: "Believe you can and you're halfway there." - Theodore Roosevelt
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_27: "The only way to do great work is to love what you do." - Steve Jobs
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_28: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts." - Winston Churchill
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_29: "The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams." - Eleanor Roosevelt
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_30: "Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life." - Steve Jobs
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_31: "It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop." - Confucius
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_32: "The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it." - Unknown
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_33: "Opportunities don't happen. You create them." - Chris Grosser
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_34: "Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great." - John D. Rockefeller
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_35: "The secret of getting ahead is getting started." - Mark Twain
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_36: "Great things never came from comfort zones." - Unknown
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_37: "The best revenge is massive success." - Frank Sinatra
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_38: "I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination." - Jimmy Dean
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_39: "You miss 100% of the shots you don't take." - Wayne Gretzky
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_40: "The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible." - Charles Kingsleigh
cs.console.toad.message._rolling_41: "The more I want to get something done, the less I call it work." - Richard Bach
